name: v1_reversegeocoding
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geocoding_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Convert city locations to latitude/longitude coordinates and vice versa. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/geocoding and https://api-ninjas.com/api/reversegeocoding.
API description: This function performs reverse geocoding using the API Ninjas service to obtain location information based on provided latitude and longitude coordinates.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate to be used for reverse geocoding.

lon.description: The longitude coordinate to be used for reverse geocoding.
